abstract: Television executives and financial experts are questioning timing of Univision's planned initial public offering, in light of concerns about its business prospects in volatile media market; primary reason for concern is declining TV viewership, which is particularly worrying for TV-based media companies.
lead_paragraph: More troubling than its battle with Donald Trump, the Spanish-language broadcaster is dealing with a mixed bag of concerns — the same faced by most TV-based media companies — as it decides to go public.

headline.main: Ahead of I.P.O., Univision Faces Bigger Rival Than Trump: Shifting TV Habits
headline.print_headline: Before I.P.O., Univision Faces Bigger Threat Than Trump: Shifting TV Habits

snippet: More troubling than its battle with Donald Trump, the Spanish-language broadcaster is dealing with a mixed bag of concerns — the same faced by most TV-based media companies — as it decides to go public.
